overview.summary: Fills in supplied sphere field with potentials values due to the specified dipoles

description.p: The current version of the module provides analytical calculation of potential on the surface of supplied sphere. The sphere is assumed to have uniform conductivity equal 1. The center of the sphere is the center of the bounding box, and the radius is half of the maximum dimension of the box
The port takes a handle to the field data object that contans TriSurfMesh as geometry

The port takes handle to the matrix of size n-by-6, contating parameters of n dipoles (the first three column are dipole position, the other there are dipole moment). The dipoles are assumed to lie inside the sphere. Otherwise warning message is produced in the module log window
Send the handle to the field object to downstream module. The field object is initial one populated with potential values at sphere nodes
